summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1794, for the improvement of Twenty-fifth Avenue North, from East Madison Street to East Roy Street, and from East Ward Street to East Helen Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, wood sidewalks, where necessary, and wood crosswalks thereon and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 18693, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
